Name: Apple Cart
Ingredients: 45 ml Calvados / apple brandy / straight applejack
10 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of (optional sugar rim) and apple wedge or dehydrated apple slice.
Garnish with apple wedge on rim or float dehydrated apple slice .
Review: A splash of apple liqueur helps balance this otherwise overly sour calvados-based Sidecar .
History: When a Sidecar is made with calvados instead of cognac it becomes an Apple Cart.
Nutrition: One serving of Apple Cart contains 206 calories
